messages.content: Hi, my name is Ian. I want to discuss about my sleeping pattern. I have trouble sleeping very late every night and wake up very late every morning as well, so I want to change that behavior, but I just cannot do that. I don't know why. I keep repeating the same mistake, so I know it's not good. I just cannot help myself to escape from it. Yeah, so with this conversation, I hope I'm able to find a plan or actionable way to sleep well, wake up well, live a good life.

non_preferred_output.content: So, you would like to discuss your sleeping pattern and the difficulty you have in changing it, am I right?
Ian, in the next 20 to 30 minutes, what would be useful for you to talk about with regard to your sleeping pattern?
